subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In addition to the Nets’ Brook Lopez, Derrick Rose, the Chicago Bulls point guard and the N.B.A.’s rookie of the year, and Memphis Grizzlies guard O. J. Mayo were selected for the all-rookie team.
snippet: In addition to the Nets’ Brook Lopez, Derrick Rose, the Chicago Bulls point guard and the N.B.A.’s rookie of the year, and Memphis Grizzlies guard O. J. Mayo were selected for the all-rookie team.
